attributes.action: Stop press from showing pictures of Jimmy Saville to show his victims some respect!
attributes.additional_details: Show the 500 plus victims of Jimmy Savilles disgusting abuse some consideration and respect by banning his pictures in the press on the news and online news sources...I'm not one of his victims but constantly seeing his face when they report news about him makes me feel sick to the pit of my stomach.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the media/press to decide upon - something the Government can't intervene in.
